text: sophia Are we gon na go soon ?
carol_peletier I do n't know , baby . I sure hope so .
carl_grimes I 'm hungry .
lori_grimes I know , Carl . We all are .
carol_peletier Why do n't I get him something to eat ? Ed 's into all this survival stuff . We 've got enough M. R. E. s to feed a small army .
lori_grimes I 'd sure appreciate it .
carol_peletier No trouble .
ed What in the hell did you tell her that for ? We do n't even know these damn people .
carol_peletier That boy is hungry . We can spare one box .
ed It 's called operational security . How long do you think this stuff is gon na last if you keep running your damn mouth off to everybody we meet ?
carol_peletier I 'm sorry . I was n't thinking .
lori_grimes You getting anything ?
shane_walsh There 's nothing .
lori_grimes Big surprise there .
shane_walsh No , I mean there 's nothing . Emergency broadcast system stopped , and that recording about the refugee center . It 's all gone . I 'm gon na go up the road , see what I can see .
lori_grimes I 'll come with you .
carol_peletier ed must have forgot to pack those M. R. E. s I found these in my purse .
lori_grimes It 's all right . Listen , do you mind keeping an eye on jackson and carl for a minute ?
jackson No .
lori_grimes shane and I are gon na go scout up ahead a little bit and see if we can find someone that knows what 's going on .
jackson We want to come with you .
lori_grimes Huh - uh . Huh - uh .
shane_walsh Hey , we 'll be back before you know it . Okay , little mans , huh ?
lori_grimes Why would they stop broadcasting about the refugee center ?
shane_walsh I do n't know .
lori_grimes Think they 're turning people away ?
shane_walsh They 're gon na have a riot on their hands if they try .
sophia Your dad 's nice .
carl_grimes Shane 's not my dad . My dad 's dead .
lori_grimes What do we do ?
shane_walsh Come here . We 're gon na do what rick would have wanted us to do , get you and carl out of here .
lori_grimes That 's not lightning .
shane_walsh You stay with me now . Come on .
lori_grimes Oh my god .
shane_walsh They 're dropping napalm in the streets .
lori_grimes shane .
shane_walsh Come here .
dale_horvath Morning .
lori_grimes Good morning .
lori_grimes I ca n't believe I slept in .
carol_peletier You must have needed it . Feeling all right ?
lori_grimes Next time wake me , all right ? Especially on laundry day .
carol_peletier I can manage . I had an idea I wanted to run by you .
lori_grimes What 's that ?

carol_peletier That big kitchen of theirs got me thinking . I would n't mind cooking in a real kitchen again . Maybe we all pitch in and cook dinner for hershel and his family tonight . Kind of looking for things to keep my mind occupied .
lori_grimes After everything they 've done for us , seems like the least we could do .
carol_peletier You mind extending the invitation ? Would just feel more right coming from you .
lori_grimes How so ?
carol_peletier You 're Rick 's wife . It sort of makes you our unofficial first lady .

rick_grimes Morning , guys . Let 's get going . We 've got a lot of ground to cover . All right , everyone 's getting new search grids today . If she made it as far as the farmhouse daryl found , she might have gone further east than we 've been so far .
jimmy I 'd like to help . I know the area pretty well and stuff .
rick_grimes Hershel 's okay with this ?
jimmy Yeah yeah . He said I should ask you .
rick_grimes All right then . Thanks .
shane_walsh Nothing about what daryl found screams sophia to me . Anyone could have been holed up in that farmhouse .
andrea_harrison Anybody includes her , right ?
daryl_dixon Whoever slept in that cupboard was no bigger than yay - high .
andrea_harrison It 's a good lead .
rick_grimes Maybe we 'll pick up her trail again .
daryl_dixon No maybe about it . I 'm gon na borrow a horse , head up to this ridge right here , take a bird's - eye view of the whole grid . If she 's up there , I 'll spot her .
theodore_douglas Good idea . Maybe you 'll see your Chupacabra up there too .
rick_grimes Chupacabra ?
dale_horvath You never heard this ? Our first night in camp , daryl tells us that the whole thing reminds him of a time he went squirrel hunting and he saw a Chupacabra .
daryl_dixon What are you braying at , jackass ?
jimmy You believe in a blood - sucking dog ?
daryl_dixon Do you believe in dead people walking around ?
rick_grimes Hey hey . Ever fire one before ?
jimmy Well , if I 'm going out , I want one .
daryl_dixon Yeah , and people in hell want slurpees .
shane_walsh Why do n't you come train tomorrow ? If you 're serious , I 'm a certified instructor .
andrea_harrison For now he can come with us .
shane_walsh He 's yours to babysit then .
rick_grimes All right , Andrea , T - Dog , I want you guys .
maggie_greene Nice guitar .
glenn_rhee dale found it on the highway . You know , we still have 11 condoms .
maggie_greene You see 11 condoms , I see 11 minutes of my life I 'm never getting back .
glenn_rhee It was n't that bad , was it ?
maggie_greene Look , I do n't even know if I like you .
glenn_rhee But you 're thinking about it . You should .

rick_grimes You remember the name of that waitress at the Dairy Queen when we were in High School ? I know you , Shane , well enough to know that there is only one sure - fire way of engaging you in a conversation , and that is to start asking you about girls you did in High School . I do n't want to , but I 'll willing to do it if that 's what it takes .
shane_walsh Maryanne . I told you about her ?
rick_grimes In excruciating detail .
shane_walsh Excruciating , my ass . You used to live for those details back in the day .
rick_grimes I was impressionable .
rick_grimes And I may have been living vicariously through you .
shane_walsh Why would n't you , with my impressive list of accomplishments ? I was an artist in his prime . A protege .
rick_grimes You mean prodigy .
shane_walsh Maybe . Is prodigy what you called a young High School stud that bangs 30-year - olds on the regular ?
rick_grimes What 30-year - old were you banging in High School ?
shane_walsh The P. E. teacher .
rick_grimes Mr. Daniels ?
shane_walsh Mrs. Kelly .
rick_grimes The girls volleyball coach ? Was n't she married ? C'mon .
shane_walsh You know what I just remembered ? Why I never ask you about this stuff . Why do n't we talk about your High School love life then , huh ?
rick_grimes Well , that 's a short conversation . It may even already be over .
shane_walsh That right ? There was Holly , right ? Nope , that was me too .
shane_walsh Then there was Sheila . That 's the one you lied to me about .
rick_grimes I never lied about Sheila . I just got mixed up about what the bases meant .
shane_walsh Just so you know , a home run , that usually means a sexual act . That 's intercourse .
rick_grimes Yeah , I realize that now .
shane_walsh I think what you did was more like a ground rule double or something .
rick_grimes I 'm aware of the judge 's ruling .

shane_walsh Should n't be talking about this stuff . That life , it 's gone and everyone in it . Sheila . Maryanne . Mrs. Kelly . It 's like we 're old folk . All the people in our stories are all dead .
rick_grimes We ca n't just forget them .

shane_walsh The hell we ca n't . It 's hard enough accepting what 's happened without digging up the past . I 'll tell you what it is . It 's nostalgia . It 's like a drug . Keeps you from seeing things the way they are . That 's a danger . You got people depending on you .
rick_grimes You think I do n't know that ?
shane_walsh I do n't know . What are we doing ? You got every able body at your disposal out scourging these woods for a little girl we both know is likely dead .
rick_grimes You think we should abandon the search ?
shane_walsh It 's not my call , is it ?
rick_grimes I 'm asking . I 'm asking .
shane_walsh Survival , Rick . It means making hard decisions . But you 've got this knack . You spread us thinner and thinner . I 'm trying to save lives here and you 're out saving cats from trees .
rick_grimes Is that what you think sophia is , a cat in a tree ?

shane_walsh Do n't do that , man . Do n't twist my words . How many times we get called up to look for a missing child , man ? You got 72 hours . 72 hours , and after that you 're looking for a body . And that was before . I mean honestly think we 're just gon na find sophia alive ?
rick_grimes Are you that sure we wo n't ?
shane_walsh We being completely honest ?
rick_grimes I 'm counting on you to be .

shane_walsh It 's math , man . Love or not , Sophia , she only matters , to the degree in which she do n't drag the rest of us down . I thought you wanted honest . If we 'd just moved on , man , we 'd be halfway to Fort Benning right now and carl would n't have gotten shot . You said so yourself . But we 're out here , we 're risking lives . Your own son almost died . Otis , he paid that bill . What the hell are we still doing this for ?

rick_grimes I had her in my hand , Shane . She looked in my eyes and trusted me . I failed her . If I had n't , she would n't be out here . I think she 's still alive and I 'm not -- I'm not gon na write her off .
shane_walsh It 's blue . It 's andrea and T - Dog . Looks like we wandered into their grid .
daryl_dixon Sophia !
daryl_dixon Whoa . Easy easy .
daryl_dixon Whoa whoa whoa .
daryl_dixon Son of a bitch .
lori_grimes Mind your own business , glenn .
glenn_rhee You 're pregnant .
lori_grimes You ca n't tell anybody , okay ?
glenn_rhee You have n't told him yet ?
lori_grimes Something wrong ?
rick_grimes I just had a long talk with Shane . He wants to call off the search .
lori_grimes What do you think ?
rick_grimes What if it was Carl ? Would you want us to keep looking ?
lori_grimes If it was Carl , yes I 'd want to know one way or another .
rick_grimes shane says my good intentions are making us weaker , that I ca n't make the hard decisions for the good of the group .
lori_grimes They 're all hard decisions .

rick_grimes But maybe I 'm holding on to a way of thinking that does n't make sense anymore . He says it 's math , basic survival -- how much fuel , how much food , how much ammo . Not much room in that equation for being soft . It 's pretty simple when you start thinking of life like that .
lori_grimes Hey . None of us were prepared to be living life this way . You are making the best decisions you can with the information you have . I do n't see soft in that .
beth_greene Mr. Grimes . My dad wants to talk to you .
daryl_dixon Oh , come on . You 've done half . Stop being such a pussy . Come on .
hershel_greene One of my horses is missing . Did one of your people take it ?
rick_grimes I was given the impression you knew about that .
hershel_greene I did not .
rick_grimes I 'll have a word with daryl .
hershel_greene And Jimmy ? You took him out today . Did he also give you the impression of my consent ?
rick_grimes No , he said it outright . I took the boy at his word .
hershel_greene jimmy is 17 . He 's not my kin but I am responsible for him . These things need to be cleared with me .
rick_grimes Sounds like we need to work on our communication . What do you suggest ?
hershel_greene Keep it simple . I 'll control my people , you control yours .
merle_dixon Why do n't you pull that arrow out , dummy ? You could bind your wound better .
daryl_dixon merle .
merle_dixon What 's going on here ? You taking a siesta or something ?
daryl_dixon Having a shitty day , bro .
merle_dixon Like me to get your pillow ? Maybe rub your feet ?
daryl_dixon Screw you .

merle_dixon Huh - uh . You 're the one screwed from the looks of it . All them years I spent trying to make a man of you , this is what I get ? Look at you . Lying in the dirt like a used rubber . You 're gon na die out here , little brother . And for what ?
daryl_dixon A girl . They lost a little girl .
merle_dixon So you got a thing for little girls now ?
daryl_dixon Shut up .
merle_dixon 'Cause I noticed you ai n't out looking for old merle no more .
daryl_dixon Tried like hell to find you , bro .
merle_dixon Like hell you did . You split , man . Lit out first chance you got .
daryl_dixon You lit out . All you had to do was wait . We went back for you . rick and I , we did right by you .
merle_dixon This the same rick that cuffed me to the rooftop in the first place ? Forced me to cut off my own hand ? This him we 're talking about here ? You his bitch now ?
daryl_dixon I ai n't nobody 's bitch .

merle_dixon You 're a joke is what you are , playing errand boy to a bunch of pansy - asses , niggers and democrats . You 're nothing but a freak to them . Redneck trash . That 's all you are . They 're laughing at you behind your back . You know that , do n't you ? I got a little news for you , son . One day they gon na scrape you off their heels like you was dogshit . Hey . They ai n't your kin , your blood . Hell , you had any damn nuts in that sack of yours , you 'd got back there and shoot your pal rick in the face for me . Now you listen to me . Ai n't nobody ever gon na care about you except me , little brother . Ai n't nobody ever will . Come on , get up on your feet before I have to kick your teeth in . Let 's go .
daryl_dixon Son of a bitch was right .
merle_dixon Please , do n't feed the birds .
merle_dixon What 's the matter , Darylina ? That all you got in you ? Throw away that purse and climb .
daryl_dixon I liked it better when you was missing .
merle_dixon Come on , do n't be like that . I 'm on your side .
daryl_dixon Yeah ? Since when ?
merle_dixon Hell , since the day you were born , baby brother . Somebody had to look after your worthless ass .
daryl_dixon You never took care of me . You talk a big game but you was never there . Hell , you ai n't here now . Guess some things never change .
merle_dixon Well , I 'll tell you what -- I'm as real as your Chupacabra .
daryl_dixon I know what I saw .
merle_dixon And I 'm sure them shrooms you ate had nothing to do with it , right ?
daryl_dixon You 'd best shut the hell up .
merle_dixon Or what ? You 're gon na come up here and shut my mouth for me ? Well , come on and do it then , if you think you 're man enough . Hey , kick off them damn high heels and climb , son .

merle_dixon You know what ? If I were you I 'd take a pause for the cause , brother . 'Cause I just do n't think you 're gon na make it to the top . Come on . Come on , little brother . Grab your friend Rick 's hand .
daryl_dixon Yeah , you 'd better run .

lori_grimes Oh yeah ? I never thought I 'd be so happy to see a potato . I 'm just glad we 're not roasting squirrels over a fire in the woods . Thank you , Patricia , so much for letting us into your house .
hershel_greene What 's this ?
maggie_greene lori and carol are cooking dinner for us all tonight .
hershel_greene That 's the first I 've heard of it .
maggie_greene I did n't think it was that big a deal . They want to thank us for helping them .
hershel_greene We need to be setting clear boundaries with these people . They 're getting a little too comfortable .
maggie_greene It 's just dinner .
hershel_greene What 's going on with you and the Asian boy ?
maggie_greene Glenn . He 's a friend .
hershel_greene I 'd rather he was n't . Bad enough I have to chase beth and jimmy around .
maggie_greene Well , you do n't have to chase me around . I 'm not 16 .
hershel_greene I know you 're not . That 's why I 'm counting on you to be the mature one . You know how I feel . Please do n't make things harder than they need to be .
maggie_greene I 'm a little old for us to be having this conversation .
hershel_greene Do n't get close to them . They 're not going to be around forever .
dale_horvath What 's with the Annie Oakley routine ?
andrea_harrison I do n't want to wash clothes anymore , Dale . I want to help keep the camp safe . Is that all right with you ?
glenn_rhee Sorry . Just returning your book .
dale_horvath Oh no , I 'm sorry . If I had known the world was ending , I 'd have brought better books .

glenn_rhee Uh . Dale , you think Andrea 's on her period ? I 'm only asking 'cause it 's like all the women are acting really weird . And I read somewhere that when women spend a lot of time together , their cycles line up and they all get super crazy hormonal at the same time .
dale_horvath I 'm gon na advise you to keep that theory to yourself .
glenn_rhee Yeah .
dale_horvath Who else is acting weird ?
glenn_rhee maggie .
dale_horvath Ah , maggie .
glenn_rhee She started off being mean to me . Then she wanted to have sex with me . And now she 's being mean to me again . And I do n't even want to know what 's going on with lori .
dale_horvath What 's going on with Lori ?
glenn_rhee Nothing . I do n't know .

dale_horvath All right , let 's take this back a step . How do you know that maggie wanted to have sex with you ? Oh , son , you did n't . Did it ever occur to you how her father might feel about this ?
glenn_rhee She 's 22 .
dale_horvath And he is our host .
glenn_rhee He does n't know .
dale_horvath Well , see that it stays that way . Jesus , Glenn , what were you thinking ?
glenn_rhee I was thinking that I might be dead tomorrow . Thanks for the book . You 're right , it sucks .
andrea_harrison Walker . Walker !
rick_grimes Just the one ?
andrea_harrison I bet I can nail it from here .
rick_grimes No no , Andrea . Put the gun down .
shane_walsh You 'd best let us handle this .
rick_grimes Shane , hold up . hershel wants to deal with walkers .
shane_walsh What for , man ? We got it covered .
dale_horvath Andrea , do n't .
andrea_harrison Back off , dale .
glenn_rhee Is that Daryl ?
daryl_dixon That 's the third time you 've pointed that thing at my head . You gon na pull the trigger or what ?
rick_grimes No ! No ! No !
lori_grimes Rick !
hershel_greene What on earth 's going on out here ?
daryl_dixon I was kidding .
rick_grimes Come on .
andrea_harrison Oh my god . Oh my god , is he dead ?
rick_grimes Unconscious . You just grazed him .
glenn_rhee But look at him . What the hell happened ? He 's wearing ears .
rick_grimes Let 's keep that to ourselves .
theodore_douglas Guys , is n't this Sophia 's ?
daryl_dixon I found it washed up on the creek bed right there . She must have dropped it crossing there somewhere .
rick_grimes Cuts the grid almost in half .
daryl_dixon Yeah , you 're welcome .
rick_grimes How 's he looking ?
hershel_greene I had no idea we 'd be going through the antibiotics so quickly . Any idea what happened to my horse ?
daryl_dixon Yeah , the one who almost killed me ? If it 's smart , it left the country .
hershel_greene We call that one Nelly , as in nervous Nelly . I could have told you she 'd throw you if you 'd bothered to ask . It 's a wonder you people have survived this long .
rick_grimes He 'll be all right .
shane_walsh I hate to say it , but I 'm with hershel on this one . Ca n't keep going out there , not after this .
rick_grimes You 'd quit now ? daryl just risked his life to bring back the first hard evidence we 've had .
shane_walsh That is one way to look at it . The way I see it , daryl almost died today for a doll .
rick_grimes Yeah , I know how you see it .
shane_walsh I 'm not out to be a hard case . Just being realistic .
shane_walsh He 's just got to start making the tough calls . You know I 'm right .

lori_grimes I may not agree with all of his choices , but I respect him . I know yours and mine and your way is n't harder . It 's the easiest thing in the world to cut our losses and to not help . You keep telling yourself you 're making the tough calls you 're really just trying-- .

shane_walsh The only thing I care about now in this world is you , jackson and Carl . So I apologize if I appear to be insensitive to the needs of others , but you see I 'll do whatever it takes to keep the three of you safe .
lori_grimes Even abandoning a lost child ? Really ?
shane_walsh Yeah .
lori_grimes My sons and I are not your problem anymore , or your excuse .
andrea_harrison How 's he doing ?
dale_horvath He 'll be fine . What about you ?
andrea_harrison I shot daryl .
dale_horvath Do n't be too hard on yourself . We 've all wanted to shoot daryl .
lori_grimes Baby , what do I do ?
carol_peletier Dinner 's ready . You coming ?
lori_grimes Mm - hmm .
carol_peletier You need anything ?
lori_grimes Huh - uh , I 'll be right there .
glenn_rhee Does anybody know how to play guitar ? dale found a cool one . Somebody 's got to know how to play .
patricia Otis did .
hershel_greene Yes , and he was very good too .
carol_peletier How are you feeling ?
daryl_dixon As good as I look .
carol_peletier I brought you some dinner . You must be starving .
daryl_dixon Watch out , I got stitches .
carol_peletier You need to know something . You did more for my little girl today than her own daddy ever did in his whole life .
daryl_dixon I did n't do anything rick or shane would n't have done .
carol_peletier I know . You 're every bit as good as them . Every bit .
maggie_greene You were n't supposed to see this .
